attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215217. This vehicle comes with a full Service History, An off-road fanatic's dream. Comes with Accessories Worth R35K, lifted suspension, rock sliders and bash plate already installed. Cool features such as Hunting cattle Rail an Infotainment system, Active Traction Control (ATRC), Chrome Door Handles, LED lights, Bluetooth connectivity and USB port. We accept Trade-ins, Finance can be arranged. Test Drive Today!

We do a 108 quality check on every vehicle and we do roadworthy upon delivery. the price excludes dealer fees. errors and omissions reserved. T&C's apply

+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)

attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.
